{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Linksys |model=WGA54G |revision=v2.1 |manuf=Gemtek |manuf_model=WACR-120GL |availability= |type=bridge |fcc_id=Q87-WGA54GV2 |ic_id=3839A-WGA54GV2 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=RDC |cpu1_model=R2600 |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=0.5 |fla1_brand=Eon |fla1_model=EN29LV400T-70TC |ram1=2 |ram1_brand=GLT |ram1_model=GLT5160L16-7TC |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |serial= |jtag= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=RDC |wi1_chip1_model=R2600 |wi1_chip2_brand=Ralink |wi1_chip2_model=RT2525 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ch= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }}''Wireless-G Game Adapter''
{{SupportPage|vendor=Linksys|model=WGA54G}} OEM Gemtek WACR-120GL (WACR-120GL_V01) The power adapter included with the device is a '''Linksys''' AD 12/0.5A RH41-1200500DU (12V, 0.5A).
